entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Labrador City
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:03 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -20.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wabush Airport 04:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -20.8°C
Pressure: 98.9 kPa
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -23.4°C
Wind: NNE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 28 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 28 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:46 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:46 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the evening. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 9:46 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
